mapper.insert: insert into used_products (up_id, prod_id, mem_id, grade, up_regdate, up_comment) values (seq_upproduct.nextval, #{prod_id}, #{mem_id}, #{grade}, sysdate, #{up_comment})

select seq_upproduct.nextval from dual
insert into used_products (up_id, prod_id, mem_id, grade, up_regdate, up_comment) values (seq_upproduct.nextval, #{prod_id}, #{mem_id}, #{grade}, sysdate, #{up_comment})
